title: Hoping to buy at least one of these T206's by the end of the year
author: t206wagner

posts.post_title: Hoping to buy at least one of these T206's by the end of the year
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy at least one of these before the end of the year to meet my goal.  Looking for them to be in the fair to good range.  A higher grade is okay, but I am looking to keep cost down.

1.Chief Bender trees 
2.George Browne Washington
3.Hal Chase trophy
4.Hal Chase pink portrait
5.
6.Bill Dahlen Brooklyn
7.Joe Doyle hands above head
8.Johnny Evers portrait 
9.Willie Keeler portrait 
10.Willie Keeler batting 
11.Nap Lajoie with bat 
12.Carl Lundgren Chicago
13.Carl Lundgren Kansas City
14.John McGraw portrait no cap 
15.Frank Smith Chicago & Boston
16.Joe Tinker bat on shoulder 
17.Joe Tinker hands on knees 
18.Zack Wheat 
19.Vic Willis with bat

I can help you out with the Bender (trees) and Keeler (port.) if your interested.

The Bender is an SGC 50 (awesome card.... a canidate for regrade)

The Keeler is ungraded.

Send me your email address if you would like some scans.

I am currently selling off all of my T206's for other priorities right now.
Most of my T206's are SGC graded. I still have over 150 left with almost all of the Southern League (all but 6).

I could make you a heck of a deal if you decide to purchase any of these.

Chad

Chad - I'd be interested in seeing the list of what you have. I sent you a PM. Thanks!

Eric
